rows.label: tev001095_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh. Hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0002
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0006
rows.name:
I was just thinking about how much water is in this
purification plant. It's a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0007
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0011
rows.name:
My brother really enjoys alcohol.
Did you know that about him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_JNK0010
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: tev001095_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Phog if he wants to make ice for Frye's drinks.

rows.label: tev001095_JNK0020
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: tev001095_SEL0021
rows.name:
Laugh and insist that you can drink
Frye under the table.

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0017
rows.name: No, this is a larger and much more serious problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0018
rows.name:
My brother has a birthday coming up, and I'd like to
do something special for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0019
rows.name:
We're each other's only remaining family, after all,
and this is his first birthday since we've reconciled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0020
rows.name:
I was thinking it would make him really happy if I
turned all of this water into Scotch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0021
rows.name:
But I understand how citizens of New LA might...object
to that idea, so I'm trying to consider alternates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0023
rows.name: Is that really true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0024
rows.name: Then you might appreciate this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0025
rows.name:
My brother has a birthday coming up, and I wanted to
do something special for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0026
rows.name:
We're each other's only remaining family, after all,
and this is his first birthday since we've reconciled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0027
rows.name:
I was thinking I'd turn all this water into Scotch,
but I'm beginning to think that's not such a great plan.
So now I'm considering alternates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0029
rows.name: Does anything come to mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_JNK0030
rows.name: Special Booze

rows.label: tev001095_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest that Phog have L concoct a special alcohol.

rows.label: tev001095_JNK0040
rows.name: Raging Party

rows.label: tev001095_SEL0041
rows.name: Propose that Phog invite everyone over for a party.

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0035
rows.name: That's a really good idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'm sure L could whip up a new type of alcohol that
would really surprise Frye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0037
rows.name: Thank you for the idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0038
rows.name:
First you helped my brother and I reconcile,
and now you're giving me good advice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0039
rows.name:
I hope you will always be such a good friend to the
Christoph family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0042
rows.name: Hmmm... That might be for the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0043
rows.name:
My brother doesn't even seem to taste the alcohol he
drinks, so a special booze might be wasted on him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0044
rows.name: All he really wants is opportunities TO drink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0045
rows.name:
I could cook a meal, invite all his friends over,
and throw him a really fun party.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0046
rows.name: Of course, you'd be at the top of the guest list.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001095_MSG0047
rows.name:
You've been a great friend to the Christoph family,
after all.[ST:wait ]
